attributes.action: Implement better safety measures within  a school environment
attributes.additional_details:
To ensure that all students feel safe at school.
To ensure  students have respect towards each other.
To make sure students don't feel embarrassed to speak up about incidents of harassment.
To ensure that students know about their rights in relation to harassment.
 To educate all young people on sexual and physical assault.
attributes.background: Update the National Curriculum educate students about the impacts of sexaul assault and harrasment on people's lives and wellbeing

rejection.details:
We currently have two open petition that cover your request which you may like to sign:

Include sexual assault mitigation in the curriculum, save women from violence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579496

Make the education of sexual consent, assault & rape compulsory in junior school
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579211
